name: Paradise, California (Camp Fire Area)
description: 2018 Camp Fire impact zone - infrastructure risk analysis for the deadliest and most destructive wildfire in California history

bbox._note: Extended north to 39.76 for landslide validation coverage (Honey Run Road, Butte Creek Canyon). min_lon kept at -121.70 to stay within Sentinel-2 tile T10SFJ (extending west crosses into T10SEJ).
